language.lang001: RSS (Really Simple Syndication) - a family of XML-format, intended to describe the news feeds of the announcement, etc. Information from various sources, presented in a format RSS, can be collected, processed and presented to the user in a convenient way by special aggregator programs ...
language.lang003: As a rule, through the RSS 2.0 given the announcement of the new information published on this site and its link to the full version. Internet resource in RSS format called RSS-feed, RSS-channel, or RSS-fidom.
